name: Magical Blocks – Premium Gutenberg Blocks
author: Noor alam

sections.description:
Create or add elements to your website with the magical way!!

Now you can add or update your site pages and widgets elements very easily by Magical Blocks. Supercharge your Gutenberg block with highly customizable Magical Blocks For Gutenberg.

Magical Blocks For Gutenberg is one of the most user-friendly Addons For Gutenberg. You can display your site content magically by Magical Blocks For Gutenberg. You can set unlimited options for every widget. You can achieve nearly any design with your imagination. Each widget and addon has been tested on different screen sizes, mobile devices.

Magical Blocks For Gutenberg has a huge collection of premium, easy to use yet highly functional extensions that can be used in a Gutenberg page builder. This is really a premium plugin that you can get for free.

Avilable Addons

  • Magical Banner
  • Magical Image Carousel
  • Magical Card
  • Magical Info Box
  • Magical Hover card
  • Magical Accordion
  • Custom Page Tempalte
  • Working for More Blocks

Translations

  • English
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

First things first, thank you for choosing our Magical Blocks plugin!

You can install the plugin one of two ways:

Install using FTP

  • Unzip the magical-blocks.zip file locally to your machine
  • Connect to your FTP area using your preferred FTP package
  • Upload the magical-blocks.zip folder that you extracted from the zip file to the plugin folder of your WordPress installation (wp-content -> plugin)
  • Go to plugin and activate Magical Blocks.

Install by WordPress (recommended)

  • Login to your WordPress admin area.
  • Navigate to plugin and click the Add New button at the top.
  • Click the Upload plugin button at the top.
  • Click the Choose File button and locate the magical-blocks.zip file on your machine and click the Install Now button.
  • On the basis the plugin installs correctly, click the Activate link.
sections.faq:
Does it work with any WordPress theme?

Yes, it will work with any WordPress theme as long as you are using Gutenberg.

Will this plugin slow down my website speed?

No, the plugin don’t slow your website.

Can I use the plugin without Gutenberg?

No. You cannot use without Gutenberg since it’s an addon for Gutenberg.
